dict.string: Cute, cuddly, and we're almost positive it doesn't want to take over the planet.
An exclusive Pet Brain for purchasing the Brainiac Pack! It seems to like you!
A tame bull frog that was once evil.
A cute bunny, your friend forever.
A cute bunny, your friend forever.
A fancy, fluffy cat that excels at shedding all over nice clothes.
Three times the heads means three times the cute! Also, bonus barking.
A breed specially designed for office shenanigans.
Symbolizes power, luck, and looking snazzy in green.
A tame groundhog that was once evil.
Farnsworth P. Duckington comes from an established line of aristocratic water fowl. Tally ho!
A tame foul owl that was once evil.
Theres no telling what sort of creature this was when it was living. It sure is friendly though.
Run, run as fast as you can. You'll never lose me, I'm your pet Gingerbread Man.
He floats upon tiny wings and pure happiness.
A tame locust that was once evil.
A hungry, curious Morp from Eat Eat Hooray!
A streetwise worm from the big city. Play Zombie Life today!
Your one and only significant Otter. You two will be Otterly inseparable!
What's more adorable than a waddling penguin? Absolutely nothing.
Even its sharp, pointy teeth are cute and cuddly.
A pleasantly pretty, pink, and prancing pony to perfect your farm!
The benevolent forest fairy from Tree World is visiting your farm!
Flapping its way into your heart.
Seal pups are made of 10% flippers, 30% blubber, and 600% love.
A tame skunk that was once evil.
With teeny-tiny flailing arms and a giant head filled with teeth, it can only be a T-Rex.
A fashionable fowl that answers to Fred.
